description.eng: More experienced pro mercs hang out here
description.trans: 更有經驗的職業傭兵聚集在這裡

description.eng: Usually amateur mercs hang out here
description.trans: 通常是業餘佣兵在這裡聚集

description.eng: Professional mercs likes discuss about their gig here
description.trans: 職業佣兵喜歡在這裡討論他們的任務。

description.eng: Attacks the enemy for certain amount of damage
description.trans: 對敵人造成一定量的傷害

description.eng: Attacks the enemy for certain amount of damage
description.trans: 對敵人造成一定量的傷害

description.eng: Heals your character for certain amount of health
description.trans: 治療你的角色一定量的生命值。

description.eng: Heals your team for certain amount of health
description.trans: 治療你的隊伍一定量的生命值。

description.eng: Poisons the enemy for certain amount of damage
description.trans: 對敵人施加毒素，造成一定量的傷害。

triggered.trans: ${merc} 毒害了所有敵人，${enemy} 受到了 ${damage} 點傷害。

instruction.trans: 按住並釋放以進行攻擊

description.eng: hack into the cyberspace and steal some useful data to sell in the black market
description.trans: 入侵網絡空間，竊取有用的數據並在黑市上出售。

description.eng: wonder around the outskirts of the city and find some loot
description.trans: 在城市周圍四處探索並尋找戰利品。

description.eng: Contribute to territory control for your gang
description.trans: 為你的幫派貢獻領地控制

description.eng: Please ensure stable network connection. or server might be under maintenance.
description.trans: 請確保網路連線穩定，否則伺服器可能正在維護中。

description.eng: Failed to connect to mainframe. Please ensure network connection is stable. or server is under maintenance.
description.trans: 無法連接主機。請確保網路連線穩定或伺服器正在進行維護。

title.trans: 重新連線至主機...第 ${attempt} 次嘗試

title.eng: This content is contributable by community, click here to edit or add your own content into the game.
title.trans: 這個內容可以由社群共同補充，點擊這裡來編輯或新增你自己的內容到遊戲

itemLost.eng: ${amount} items from backpack was taken as compensation to Ripperdoc
itemLost.trans: 已從背包中拿走${amount}件物品作為賠償給搶匪醫生。

upgradeItemHint.eng: Try level up and upgrade your items
upgradeItemHint.trans: 嘗試升級和升級您的物品。

upgradeMercenary.trans: 升級或雇用更多的僱傭兵。

description.eng: Hard difficulty stronghold.
description.trans: 困難難度地城。

description.eng: Normal difficulty stronghold.
description.trans: 普通難度地城。

territoryGang.eng: Strongholds created by member of ${gangName} in this district will receive extra buff
territoryGang.trans: 在這個地區由 ${gangName} 的成員所建立的要塞將會獲得額外的強化效果。

territoryNoGang.eng: Control this territory to get extra buff in this district
territoryNoGang.trans: 掌控此區域可在此地區獲得額外增益效果。

noHealing.eng: Looks like your are running low on healing items, purchase some so you can it in the stronghold
noHealing.trans: 看起來你的回復物品不足，購買一些可以在地城中使用。

desc.eng: Has higher damage than normal enemies
Has higher health than normal enemies
desc.trans: 比普通敵人有更高的生命值

description.eng: Error report has been sent to the developer. \nIf this error persists, please contact the developer at ${email}
description.trans: 錯誤報告已發送給開發人員。\n如果這個問題仍然持續，請聯繫開發人員，

description.eng: This item has been destroyed. You can attempt to repair it in the ${repairNpc}.
description.trans: 此項目已被摧毀。您可以在 ${repairNpc} 那裡嘗試修復它。

description.eng: A piece of equipment that protects the feet.
description.trans: 保護腳部的裝備。

description.eng: A traditional dish of braised pork belly and rice.
description.trans: 紅燒肉飯

description.eng: a rare delicacy made from real wheat flour, smuggled by rebels who oppose the synthetic food industry.
description.trans: 由反對合成食品產業的叛亂分子走私而來，使用真正的小麥粉製成的稀有美食。

description.eng: A cheap and addictive food made from synthetic meat and chemicals. Popular among lowlifes and hackers who need a quick energy boost.
description.trans: 一種由合成肉和化學物質製成的便宜且容易成癮的食品。受到低端人群和需要快速能量補充的駭客的歡迎。

description.eng: Universal calibration token for equipments, use to improve equipments
description.trans: 通用校準代幣用於裝備升級。

description.eng: Use to decrease chance of equipment destruction by ${percent}% when calibration failed
description.trans: 當校準失敗時，使用可將設備損壞機率降低${percent}%。

description.eng: Use to level up an common item to its next level
description.trans: 使用以將普通物品升級到下一級

description.eng: Use to upgrade an common item to uncommon tier
description.trans: 使用以將普通物品升級為非凡級別

description.eng: Use to enter a dungeon
description.trans: 使用進入地城。

description.eng: A weapon that uses energy to fire.
description.trans: 一種使用能量開火的武器。

description.eng: Use to level up an epic item to its next level
description.trans: 使用以將史詩物品升級到下一級

description.eng: Use to reset a epic item with new traits by chance
description.trans: 使用以機率重置一件史詩物品的特性

description.eng: Use to upgrade an unique item to epic tier
description.trans: 使用以將獨特道具升級至史詩級別

description.eng: A medium sized vibrant fish, it's highly sought after for its psychedelic properties when consumed.
description.trans: 一種中等大小的色彩鮮艷的魚，食用後具有迷幻作用，因此廣受追捧。

description.eng: Use to contribute to gang territory control
description.trans: 使用以貢獻幫派領地控制。

description.eng: A traditional firearm that uses gunpowder to fire bullets. cant go wrong with this one.
description.trans: 使用火藥發射子彈的傳統火器。這個是不會出差錯的。

description.eng: Use to recover small amount of health
description.trans: 使用以恢復少量生命值。

description.eng: Use to recover moderate amount of health
description.trans: 使用以恢復中等量的生命值

description.eng: A piece of equipment that protects the head.
description.trans: 頭部保護裝備。

description.eng: Use to identify unknown traits in a item
description.trans: 使用來辨認物品中未知的特徵

description.eng: Universal level up token for equipments, use to increase the level of an equipment
description.trans: 裝備通用等級提升代幣，用於提升裝備等級。

description.eng: A mysterious container that contains a random item.
description.trans: 一個包含隨機物品的神秘容器。

description.eng: A piece of equipment that protects the lower body.
description.trans: 保護下半身的裝備。

description.eng: Use this token to meet and recruit new mercenaries in Red Bar
description.trans: 使用這個代幣在紅酒吧招募新的傭兵。

description.eng: Neural Upgrade Augmenter is a cutting-edge implant that enables users to break past their mental limitations and reach untold levels of cognitive enhancement. With the ability to exceed typical neural barriers, users can unlock new levels of insight, creativity, and physical performance.
description.trans: 神經升級增強器是一種尖端的植入物，可以讓使用者突破其精神限制，達到無法想像的認知增強水平。具有超越典型神經障礙的能力，使用者可以開啟新的洞察力、創造力和身體表現的水平。

description.eng: EuroDollar is a widely accepted currency in the continent, used for everyday purchases and transactions.
description.trans: 歐元是在這個大陸上被廣泛使用的貨幣，用於日常消費和交易。

description.eng: NetCoin is a digital currency mainly used in black market transactions. It is untraceable and can be used to purchase illegal goods and services.
description.trans: NetCoin是一種主要用於黑市交易的數字貨幣。它是不可追蹤的，並可用於購買非法商品和服務。

description.eng: Neuroblockers were developed to counteract the negative effects that cybernetic implants had on the human body. By suppressing these effects, people were able to use these implants with reduced suffering from physical or mental issues
description.trans: 神經阻斷劑被開發出來以對抗電馭元件對人體產生的負面影響。通過抑制這些影響，人們能夠使用這些元件，減少身體或心理問題所帶來的痛苦。

description.eng: Slice of ordinary synthetic pork
description.trans: 一片普通合成豬肉片

description.eng: Premium Currency is a special currency that can be used to purchase premium items in the shop.
description.trans: 高級貨幣是一種特殊貨幣，可用於購買商店中的高級物品。

description.eng: Use to decrease chance of equipment destruction by ${percent}% when calibration failed
description.trans: 當校準失敗時，使用可將裝備損壞機率減少${percent}%。

description.eng: Use to level up an rare item to its next level
description.trans: 使用以將稀有物品升級到下一級

description.eng: Use to reset a rare item with new traits by chance
description.trans: 使用以機率重置稀有物品的特性

description.eng: Use to upgrade an uncommon item to rare tier
description.trans: 使用以將不尋常的物品升級到稀有等級

description.eng: Use to repair equipments
description.trans: 使用來修復裝備

description.eng: A staple food of the continent.
description.trans: 該大陸的主食。

description.eng: A traditional Indonesian dish made from skewered meat and rice.
description.trans: 印尼傳統菜肴，由串燒肉和米飯製成。

description.eng: A traditional Japanese dish made from raw fish and rice.
description.trans: 一道由生魚和飯製成的日本傳統料理。

description.eng: A melee weapon that has sharpened edges.
description.trans: 一種帶有鋒利邊緣的近戰武器。

description.eng: A piece of tech scrap.
description.trans: 一份科技廢料。

description.eng: Use to decrease chance of equipment destruction by ${percent}% when calibration failed
description.trans: 當校準失敗時，使用可以減少裝備損壞機率${percent}%。

description.eng: Use to level up an uncommon item to its next level
description.trans: 使用以將不尋常物品升級到下一級

description.eng: Use to reset a uncommon item with new traits by chance
description.trans: 使用機會重置罕見物品的屬性

description.eng: Use to level up an unique item to its next level
description.trans: 使用以將獨特物品升級到下一級

description.eng: Use to reset a unique item with new traits by chance
description.trans: 使用可隨機重置獨特物品的特性。

description.eng: Use to upgrade an rare item to unique tier
description.trans: 使用來將稀有物品升級為獨特層級

description.eng: A piece of equipment that protects the upper body.
description.trans: 保護上半身的裝備。

description.eng: A bounty hunter is a mercenary who uses their skills to hunt down their enemies
description.trans: 賞金獵人是一個僱傭兵，使用其技能追踪敵人。

description.eng: A netrunner is a hacker who uses their skills to infiltrate computer systems
description.trans: 網絡行走是一名利用其技能滲透電腦系統的駭客。

description.eng: A protector is a mercenary who uses their skills to protect their allies
description.trans: 一位保護者是一名僱傭兵，利用他們的技能保護他們的盟友。

blackMarketCurrencyDescription.eng: The black market currency, can only be obtained from in game and premium store
blackMarketCurrencyDescription.trans: 黑市貨幣只能在遊戲內和高級商店中獲得。

mercExpCurrencyDescription.eng: A nano-machine injection device created by Taixing Cybernetics, providing unparalleled upgrades to cybernetic abilities. Inject into the neck for enhanced performance.
mercExpCurrencyDescription.trans: 由台興電子製造的納米機器注射裝置，可提供無與倫比的電子增強能力。注射於

mercUpgradeCurrencyDescription.eng: Neural Upgrade Augmenter is a cutting-edge implant that enables users to break past their mental limitations and reach untold levels of cognitive enhancement. With the ability to exceed typical neural barriers, users can unlock new levels of insight, creativity, and physical performance.
mercUpgradeCurrencyDescription.trans: 神經升級增強器是一種尖端的植入物，使使用者能夠突破其精神限制，達到無法想像的認知增強水平。憑藉超越典型神經屏障的能力，使用者可以解鎖新的洞察力、創造力和身體表現水平。

normalCurrencyDescription.eng: A common currency that can be obtained from in game easily
normalCurrencyDescription.trans: 一種可以輕鬆在遊戲中獲得的通用貨幣

premiumCurrencyDescription.eng: Universal Dollars is a rare currency that can only be obtained through premium store.
premiumCurrencyDescription.trans: 通用幣是一種罕見的貨幣，只能通過高級商店獲得。

description.eng: Popular bar amounts mercenaries, you can find Chloe here and meet other mercenaries
description.trans: 受歡迎的酒吧聚集了許多僱傭兵，你可以在這裡找到Chloe並與其他僱傭兵會面。

trans: 我不喜歡閒聊，你想喝什麼？
你不太健談，我喜歡。你要點什麼？

description.eng: If you are injured, you can visit Oriana to fix you up, with a price of course.
description.trans: 如果您受傷了，您可以拜訪Oriana進行治療，當然需要付費。

description.eng: A general store, you can purchase common items here
description.trans: 一般商店，你可以在這裡購買常見物品。

eng: Hey there, welcome to my store!
Could you do this for me?
Let me know when you have completed the objectives :)
trans: 完成目標後請讓我知道 :)

description.eng: Are you sure you want to abandon this quest?
description.trans: 您確定要放棄此任務嗎？

dungeonDrop.eng: Your backpack was full.\nPlease remove some stuff before picking up the loots.
dungeonDrop.trans: 你的背包已滿。\n在撿拾戰利品之前，請先移除一些物品。

description.eng: Clear up some space here so you can pickup the loots.
description.trans: 清理一些空間，這樣你就可以撿起戰利品了。

description.eng: Unlock by toggling the switches in correct sequence
description.trans: 透過正確順序切換開關來解鎖

attack.eng: Hold and release at correct timing to perform attacks.
attack.trans: 在正確的時機按住並釋放以進行攻擊。

crew1.eng: Click here to view your profile
crew1.trans: 點擊這裡查看您的個人資料。

crew2.eng: Click here to view your crew members
crew2.trans: 點擊這裡查看你的船員。

crew3.eng: Click on one of the slots to assign a crew member
crew3.trans: 點擊其中一個插槽以分配機組人員

dailyQuest.eng: You have completed daily quests. open this tab to view them.
dailyQuest.trans: 您已完成每日任務。打開此選項卡以查看它們。

deathItem.eng: You can buy back the items you lost from clinic.
deathItem.trans: 你可以從診所買回你失去的物品。

deathItem2.eng: Click here to view your lost items.
deathItem2.trans: 點擊這裡查看你失去的物品。

freeMerc1.eng: Click here for all kinds of benefits
freeMerc1.trans: 點擊這裡以獲得各種好處

freeMerc2.trans: 點擊這裡以獲得免費的${itemName}

heal.eng: Click here to assign healing items to quick slots.
heal.trans: 點擊這裡將治療物品分配到快速欄位。

localEnemy1.eng: Click here to scan for nearby enemies.
localEnemy1.trans: 點擊這裡掃描附近的敵人。

localEnemy2.eng: Click on an enemy to engage in battle.

mercenary1.eng: Click here to view your mercenary contacts
mercenary1.trans: 點擊這裡查看傭兵聯絡人。

mercenary2.eng: Click here to recruit new mercenaries
mercenary2.trans: 點擊這裡招募新的傭兵。

mercenary3.eng: Click here to recruit 10 new mercenaries
mercenary3.trans: 點擊這裡招募10名新傭兵。

quest.eng: Click here to view your quests.
quest.trans: 點擊這裡查看你的任務。

upgradeItem.eng: Click here to upgrade your items.
upgradeItem.trans: 點擊這裡升級你的物品。

upgradeItemDetails.eng: Click here to upgrade this item.

alreadyTriedEscape.eng: You already tried to escape in this turn!
alreadyTriedEscape.trans: 你在這回合已經試過逃脫了！
